alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 6:31AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, central Marion and south central Putnam Counties through 700 AM EST... At 630 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower near Ocala, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Fort McCoy, Salt Springs, Citra, Lynne, Lake Delancy, Sparr, Anthony, Fruitland and Moss Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Marion; Western Putnam
